DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test whether SU011248 has activity and is safe compared to interferon-alfa as first-line therapy in patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma (RCC).
DOC.brief_title: SU011248 Versus Interferon-Alfa As First-Line Systemic Therapy For Patients With Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed renal cell carcinoma of clear cell histology with metastases Evidence of measurable disease by radiographic technique Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group [ECOG] performance status of 0 or 1 Prior systemic (including adjuvant or neoadjuvant) therapy of any kind for RCC History of or known brain metastases Serious acute or chronic illness or recent history of significant cardiac abnormality
